hero.monitoring: Real-time wallet monitoring, AML checks, infrastructure audit, and an external crypto manager. Connected in 1 day. No access to your private keys.

list.title: Lack of real-time transaction monitoring
list.description: The company has no regulated process or tool that logs and notifies about incoming/outgoing transactions on corporate wallets in real time.

list.title: Receiving and sending high-risk funds
list.description: Crypto assets with a high-risk origin (linked to fraud, sanctions lists, darknet markets, mixers, etc.) enter the company's operations without prior risk-based control.

list.title: Human factor and weak access control model
list.description: Private keys/passwords/signing rights are concentrated among specific employees; no multisignature, no role-based separation, no action logging. Storage and recovery policies are either not documented or not followed.
